mapper.select: SELECT * FROM v_info_lesson order by stu_name

SELECT * FROM v_info_lesson_fee_connect_lsn
AND ${key} like CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
order by stu_name, lsn_month desc, lsn_fee_id desc, subject_id, subject_sub_id desc, lesson_type

select stu_id ,lsn_pay_id ,lsn_fee_id ,subject_id ,subject_name ,subject_sub_name ,subject_price ,pay_style ,lesson_type ,lsn_count ,lsn_fee ,lsn_month ,pay_date ,own_flg ,1 as advc_flg from v_info_lesson_sum_fee_unpaid_yet where stu_id = #{stuId} and lsn_month like CONCAT('%', #{year}, '%') union all select paid.stu_id ,paid.lsn_pay_id ,paid.lsn_fee_id ,paid.subject_id ,paid.subject_name ,paid.subject_sub_name ,paid.subject_price ,paid.pay_style ,paid.lesson_type ,paid.lsn_count ,paid.lsn_fee ,paid.lsn_month ,paid.pay_date ,1 as own_flg ,lfap.advc_flg from v_info_lesson_sum_fee_pay_over paid left join t_info_lsn_fee_advc_pay lfap on paid.lsn_pay_id = lfap.lsn_pay_id where stu_id = #{stuId} and lsn_month like CONCAT('%', #{year}, '%') order by lsn_month, subject_id;
mapper.insert: insert into t_info_lesson_fee ( lsn_fee_id, lesson_id, pay_style, lsn_fee, lsn_month, own_flg ) values ( #{lsnFeeId}, #{lessonId}, #{payStyle}, #{lsnFee}, #{lsnMonth}, #{ownFlg} )
mapper.delete: delete from t_info_lesson_fee where lsn_fee_id = #{lsnFeeId} and lesson_id = #{lessonId}
mapper.select: SELECT subject_id,subject_name, SUM(lsn_count0) AS total_lsn_count0, SUM(lsn_count1) AS total_lsn_count1, SUM(lsn_count2) AS total_lsn_count2, lsn_month FROM (SELECT subject_id,subject_name, CASE WHEN lesson_type = 0 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END AS lsn_count0, CASE WHEN lesson_type = 1 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END AS lsn_count1, CASE WHEN lesson_type = 2 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END AS lsn_count2, lsn_month FROM v_info_lsn_statistics_by_stuid WHERE stu_id = #{stuId} AND substring(lsn_month,1,4) = #{year} ) AS derived_table GROUP BY subject_id, subject_name, lsn_month ORDER BY subject_id, subject_name, lsn_month;
